text: Wasseramt is one of the 10 districts of the canton of Solothurn in Switzerland, found in the south of the canton. Wasseramt contains these municipalities: Coat of arms Municipality Population (Dec 2005) Area, km² Aeschi 1034 3.79 Biberist 7895 12.24 Bolken 530 2.13 Deitingen 2130 7.63 Derendingen 5979 5.62 Etziken 777 3.38 Gerlafingen 4851 1.91 Halten 843 1.85 Heinrichswil-Winistorf 563 3.10 Hersiwil 173 1.41 Horriwil 833 2.60 Hüniken 91 1.01 Kriegstetten 1148 1.13 Lohn-Ammannsegg 2524 4.46 Luterbach 3193 4.54 Obergerlafingen 1097 1.52 Oekingen 697 2.45 Recherswil 1657 3.33 Steinhof 151 1.63 Subingen 2833 6.22 Zuchwil 8958 4.67 Total 47,957 76.62
title: Wasseramt District
